opis: Ekskluzivno posredujemo pri prodaji samostojeće kuće u mirnoj slijepoj ulici na vrhunskoj mikrolokaciji u Mlinovima. Kuća se sastoji od podruma (stan 1: tri spremišta, hodnik , sobe, kupaonice i stubišta), prizemlja (stan 2: predsoblje, kuhinja, soba; stan 3: ulaz, kupaonica, spremište, stubište, hodnik, blagovaonica, zimski vrt, wc i dnevni boravak), I. kat (garaža, wc, kupaonica, hodnik i tri odvojene sobe) i tavanskog prostora te na svakom katu terasa, balkon i loggia. Vrsta grijanja: plinsko centralno. Blizina svih popratnih sadržaja. Agencijska provizija naplaćuje se u skladu s Općim uvjetima poslovanja koji su dostupni na stranici: www.venera-nekretnine.hr / cjenik usluga. Agencija Vas vodi kroz pravno savjetovanje, izrade ugovora, upis vlasništva i prijenos režija na novog kupca. We exclusively mediate the sale of a detached house in a quiet cul-de-sac on a prime microlocation in Mlinov. The house consists of a basement (apartment 1: three storage rooms, corridor, rooms, bathrooms and stairs), ground floor (apartment 2: entrance hall, kitchen, room, apartment 3: entrance, bathroom, storage room, staircase, corridor, dining room, winter garden, toilet and living room) 1st floor (garage, toilet, bathroom, corridor and three separate rooms) and attic space and on each floor a terrace, balcony and loggia. Type of heating: gas central. Proximity to all accompanying facilities. The agency guides you through legal advice, contract drafting, registration of ownership and transfer of utilities to the new buyer. The agency commission is charged in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions available on the website: www.venera-nekretnine.hr / service price.
